text: Paint/coating type (latex, epoxy, enamel, elastomeric) matches approved submittals and room finish schedule
Finish type confirmed (e.g., flat, eggshell, semi-gloss, gloss) per room use
Approved primers, sealers, patching materials on site
MSDS and VOC compliance data submitted for all materials
Substrates dry, dust-free, patched, and sanded smooth
Gypsum surfaces finished to Level 4 or 5 (as specified) prior to paint
Masking and protection of adjacent surfaces completed
Primer applied and allowed proper cure time
First coat applied evenly with proper coverage and no lap marks
Final coat applied with no visible roller marks, streaks, holidays
Coats applied per manufacturer recommendation (dry film thickness, coverage rates)
Approved tools used (roller, brush, airless sprayer) for specified system
Touch-up performed where required and finish matches adjacent areas
Transition lines clean and crisp (walls to ceiling, casing to wall, etc.)
No drips, overspray, or damage to other trades
Clean-up complete and all protection removed
Final signoff by consultant or owner rep

• Surface Prep & Application Guidelines: PDCA / MPI Painting Standards
